data.question: What will be the result of invoking the wait() method on an object without ensuring that the current thread holds the lock of the object?
data.op1: The code will fail to compile
data.op3: An IllegalMonitorStateException will be thrown if the wait() method is called, while the current thread does not hold the lock of the object
data.op4: The thread will be blocked until it gains the lock of the object
